name: grafana-agent
description: A2A agent server for grafana dashboards automation tasks

skills.name: create_dashboard
skills.description: Creates a Grafana dashboard with specified panels, queries, and configurations

dashboard_title.description: The title of the Grafana dashboard

deploy.description: Whether to deploy the dashboard to Grafana (requires grafana_url and GRAFANA_DEPLOY_ENABLED=true)

description.description: Description of what the dashboard monitors or displays

grafana_url.description: Grafana server URL (overrides default configuration if provided)

metric_names.description: Array of metric names to create panels for with auto-generated PromQL queries

panels.description: Array of panel configurations (title, type, queries, etc.)

prometheus_url.description: Prometheus server URL for querying metric metadata and generating intelligent queries

time_range.description: Default time range for the dashboard (from, to)

variables.description: Dashboard template variables for dynamic queries
